3.Coverage: Bodily Injury and Property Damage Liability - Indivisible Premium

Records.Packaging: Auto coverage written as a separate policy and not an endorsement to another policy.
Records.AntiLockBrakesDiscount: Program offers an Anti-Lock Braking System discount on this coverage, but the vehicle does not qualify for the discount.
Records.DefensiveDriverDiscount: Driver does not qualify for the defensive driver discount available on this coverage.
